mcq.statement: In which year did Muhammad bin Qasim conquer Sind?
mcq.one_liner: Muhammad bin Qasim conquered Sind in the year **712 AD** during the regime of Walid bin Abdul Malik-I.

suggestions.topic: Arrival of Muhammad bin Qasim to Subcontinent (712)
